fact: Hypervigilance is reported in over 70 percent of officers with cumulative critical incident exposure.
reference: Andersen et al., Journal of Police and Criminal Psychology, 2016

fact: Chronic stress reduces prefrontal cortex regulation, increasing impulsive emotional responses. This means being more reactive and angry.
Law enforcement officers have elevated risk of cumulative stress-related health conditions over time.
reference: Violanti et al., American Journal of Industrial Medicine, 2013
